wikipedia_page.main: Philip Eden (born 13 December 1963) is a former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1980s and 1990s. He played at club level for Wakefield Trinity (Heritage № 915), Halifax (Heritage № 1064) and Castleford (Heritage № 712), as a wing or centre, i.e. number 2 or 5, or, 3 or 4.
